title: Drawing, Design for Cabinet "C," Plan and Elevation, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Cabinet "C," Plan and Elevation
markings: Watermark across verso bottom : ORIENTAL LINEN
inscribed:
Around elevation: inscribed in graphite, lower right, with arrow pointing to a cabinet leg: carvings; below, center: FRONT; below, far right: 'C'
Inside plan: inscribed in graphite, center: PLAN
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description:
Elevation (central and upper section of sheet): tri-partite glass front cabinet with 4 shelves and carved frieze; raised on 4 carved cabriole legs terminating in ball-and-claw feet; vase atop cabinet and several other vessels on shelves inside cabinet.
Plan (lower section of sheet): semi-lunar silhouette of cabinet with flattened central front.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Cabinet "C," Plan and Elevation, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-213
